messages.title: Had enough of the Politicians?
messages.content: Time to throw the whole lot out! Expense Scandal? Financial Crisis? Budget Deficit? Companies Sold Off? Afghan Occupation? Illegal Immigration? Jobs Off-Shored? I have had enough—have you?

messages.title: There are no 'safe seats' in a democracy — VOTE UKIP
messages.content: Your UKIP candidate for the General Election in Ruislip, Northwood and Pinner

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Terrorist training camps all destroyed—Job done—bring them home NOW

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Referendum on European Union Membership
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The people should be given a say—It is too important to our future

keyPolicies.policyTitle: British Jobs go to British Workers
keyPolicies.policyDescription: No more abuse of Temporary Work Visas
No more career politicians—Minimum 10 Years Work Experience to be an MP

leaflet.personalStatement: My daughter is 5 years old—what kind of country will she inherit? What will your children inherit? I am not a politician—I have worked all my life from £1 an hour and up—and I know we can't go on like this. I decided to make a stand.

images.caption: Your UKIP candidate for the General Election in Ruislip, Northwood and Pinner Jason Pontey

leaflet.additionalNotes: UKIP was 2nd in the last nationwide election—the European Election of 2009
